div.p: WELL, I WAS UP ALL NIGHT
WELL, EVEN FROM HERE I CAN
TO BOLDLY GO WHERE NO MAN
SO IT WAS IN THE BEGINNING.
IF YOU WANT TO PLAY GOD
OR TO DESTROY AT MY WILL.
DID HE TAKE HER WITH HIM?
THE WAY HE LOOKS AT HER--
WHAT HAVE YOU DONE WITH HER?
THAT IT CAN GET US KILLED.
WITH A WAVE OF MY HAND
YOU KNOW SO MUCH OF LOVE.
AND THE PIPES WE WILL PLAY,
BUT ALL THAT MAKES IT UP.
THERE IS AN ORDER OF THINGS
OF A NEW RACE OF GODS.
A BIT OF FLESH AND BLOOD
AS A FATHER LOVES HIS CHILDREN.
